params.query: SELECT /*+ _l_allow_filtering_ */ SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10) as active_date, COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS dau FROM message WHERE created_at >= '2025-09-28 00:00:00.000' AND created_at < '2025-10-22 00:00:00.000' GROUP BY SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10)
